QuestData.Title: Warn Stoneplow
QuestData.Description: My father gave me his life. Tyrande gave me her trust. My sentinels gave me their allegiance.$b$bIt is time I repaid them all.$b$bWith Brojai dead we can mop up the remaining mogu. The next threat is the mantid.$b$bGo north to Stoneplow and lend them your help. Tell them I will be bringing what sentinels I can muster to aid in the defense of their city against the mantid.
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel to Stoneplow Village in Valley of the Four Winds.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Travel to Stoneplow in the Valley of the Four Winds.
QuestData.RewardText: Mantid from the south? This is not a good day.
